frase: The universe is big. It’s vast and complicated and ridiculous. And sometimes, very rarely, impossible things just happen and we call them miracles.
about_me: I live in the state of Minas Gerais, Brazil. Graduated in Information Systems, I'm passionated on programming and technology. I made this website to share a little bit of my stuff. It have my social media and a blog. Feel free to contact me. Hope you enjoy!

blog_posts.title: A arquitetura dos meus projetos
blog_posts.description: Um post mostrando a arquitetura que eu uso nos meus projetos. Arquitetura baseada na Clean Arquitecture, que tem funcionado muito bem.
